item.title: Set process Title
item.description: Describe set proc title in python. I heard about this on Python Bytes episode XXX

item.title: About me
item.description: I’m Elliot Nelson, I like to support Science by making & keeping hardware and software working. I currently work at Diamond Light Source as a Senior Support Scientist in the Macromolecular Crystallography Vilage. I finished my PhD in 2019, working on Occupancy in Fragment Screening Crystallographic Datasets, and have worked at Diamond since.
